text: Hi everyone!  i would like to ask if here are any agencies that have specialized in HS Service Hub? If so it would be awesome to have the opportunity to have a quick chat :slightly_smiling_face:
I guess you'll need the API indeed to connect to the right contact property and its values
Morning, quick one. Is there a way to add the blog subscriber number to my subscribe title and it will auto update everytime somebody new subs? Thank you
So I could have a tagline of Join XXX subscribers today…

Hi all, I’m looking at pages being crawled for our multilingual site in HubSpot and ?HsLang is getting crawl errors for pages in search console. I wasn’t sure if HubSpot has something to recognise in not to crawl these or what the standard is in preventing urls being crawled and messing up any seo in place for these urls?

Has anybody experienced when you add a new field into an existing module that pages already using this module don't get a value until you go in and edit the field from the page side? Versus getting a default value like net new pages would?
I've experienced it many times but today when I tested again (due to a client question)... I didn't have the issue... Just trying to see if I can find why it happens sometimes and not others

a roundabout way would be using a very cheap data store like firebase to first extract the number of subscribers, triggered when a new subscriber happens. The in js, fetch that number as the blog post is rendered.

Anyone know of a Saas that will read data in and export static images out to S3? I'm looking for a way to create monthly customer visualizations for a client who wants to graphically present that data in HubSpot-generated emails. *Thanks in advance!*

:closed_lock_with_key: LOGINS :thinking_face:
——
When HubSpot Memberships isn’t an option (CMS, Starter, Pro), but a login or restricted area is required ... what solutions work well?
TBH—Wordpress. ;) we’ve done custom portals that link off of HubSpot in the early days.
Is that usually a hybrid website <@U7KKA4QQM>? (ex: HubSpot for main site, WP for login/restricted areas) .... or is it usually do the full website on WP?
yes, hybrid or we pull in Digital Ocean and Iframe it in.
yup so you don't print the h3 tag if there is no value
exactly
I have used Smart content before
Any special considerations when using Smart Content <@U38EZFVFE>? .... any extra things to setup to ensure it works smoothly?
you could do something weird too... with like a URL query string (that stands in for a password) since all query strings are turned into HubL variables and can be used for logic
ex: <http://www.domain.com/protected-content|www.domain.com/protected-content> (would give you a no access message)
<http://www.domain.com/protected-content?password=g87fe87|www.domain.com/protected-content?password=g87fe87> (would actually show the page content)
Smart content. You have yout list. Someone who is visiting the site if they are on the list sees the content as desired. other wise they see a form where you place your email
CM is right you can use that with Smart content as well.
